snippet: “B-Out,” at Andrew Edlin Gallery, assembles art tributes to larger-than-life figures like Elizabeth Taylor, Nina Simone and Larry Craig.
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews group show B-Out at Andrew Edlin Gallery.
lead_paragraph: “B-Out,” at Andrew Edlin Gallery, assembles art tributes to larger-than-life figures like Elizabeth Taylor, Nina Simone and Larry Craig.
